bioconda.name: bioconductor-birewire
bioconda.summary: High-performing routines for the randomization of a bipartite graph (or a binary event matrix), undirected and directed signed graph preserving degree distribution (or marginal totals)

biotools.summary: Fast functions for bipartite network rewiring through N consecutive switching steps and for the computation of the minimal number of switching steps to be performed in order to maximise the dissimilarity with respect to the original network. Includes functions for the analysis of the introduced randomness across the switching steps and several other routines to analyse the resulting networks and their natural projections.

bioschemas.name: BiRewire
bioschemas.summary: Fast functions for bipartite network rewiring through N consecutive switching steps and for the computation of the minimal number of switching steps to be performed in order to maximise the dissimilarity with respect to the original network. Includes functions for the analysis of the introduced randomness across the switching steps and several other routines to analyse the resulting networks and their natural projections.
